VAR1="0x$(openssl rand -hex 32)"
echo "$VAR1"
0x3c54cf4c8bdaa822eaf849f9c465cfdb49ece7a1ff88ce0edc61377488535dd2
VAR2="0x$(openssl rand -hex 32)"
echo "$VAR2"
0x02d3197642423372118f22b2a816570281043db21ff14cbcc86a781237174836

VAR3=$((VAR1 * VAR2))



VAR4="0x$(openssl rand -hex 256)"
echo "$VAR4"
0x846e193ccf10baea8e374d735b04de7598b164d9cc5e4ffc80f9c2e8de3e855
9e2ee7c601b43c695df988cacdc80dc305e3067f34b6f80e27efdd797da90b7b8
aae535c32241b5aa921e5ebaddb7ece1f15bb40026bdc23ff203d2a392a103ad3
c28fd8f120c19490efc776841e39eca8b13f1a729a0c172408611585658275d4f
2329930f9071502137d6fb6f2b6a55e228064b90000da035b9377cb28d75d30dd
90b1ee3309515fdf51996a37fb0bdfb82690791aa2ed38f144d8d3d25e457c63c
2cfb9710e125110e9f6c0802c584f645dac9d9d9c8f89188a7c8afba3689efd41
6555ea68a4cbc9dbd43c687ed4ac339fd7afd22d32714e2e939fc847787

VAR5="0x$(openssl rand -hex 256)"
echo "$VAR5"
0x770003e84287c32ae18b1a0f8149f0da8677ea4f1a4fc719e76fbdb91005a7d
465666414960942be46221e25ff377834f6df85afd7f151604e80b4600be0b1e4
bd33c9618107072b3aa9ed4960744d9d515c5d636865748de75a36c32bd1cd534
67e666365c59e8f3d0b9fecab094d65e3d8c4ccff5fa5269fe90d6ea65ec307e8
2761966669eee7c99c6c4bbe0ba292669668ed5d61563fb87ba132499668fb83d
b85499625885d14bdc63b6fb3b31817f4fee23d4b401e316b11b949c180165f98
e3d3a6efb13f35c060537b3620657256903c24a3f1de6195a5d8676f2bdd0a866
61b62731a0c6ea909ab4f17db253fa6153f4d4988979e99e049fe864006

VAR6=$((VAR4 + VAR5))
echo "$VAR6"
